DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate long-term follow-up of subjects implanted with the SImmetry Sacroiliac (SI) Joint Fusion System (SImmetry).
DOC.brief_title: CT Follow-Up of the SImmetry Sacroiliac Joint Fusion System
DOC.criteria: Patient must have a SImmetry device implanted. Patient is willing to comply with study procedures and provide informed consent. Patient is physically unable to return to the clinic for CT imaging.
